title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
summary: A tragic story of love and ambition set in the roaring twenties.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
summary: A timeless tale about justice, race, and growing up in the South.

author: George Orwell
summary: A chilling portrayal of a totalitarian society under surveillance.

title: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
summary: Bilbo Baggins embarks on an unexpected adventure filled with magic.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
summary: A witty and romantic tale of love and societal expectations.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
summary: A young shepherd’s journey to find his personal legend.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
summary: A rebellious teenager’s perspective on the adult world.

title: Brave New World
author: Aldous Huxley
summary: A futuristic society built on technology, control, and pleasure.

title: The Little Prince

summary: A poetic story about love, loneliness, and the human heart.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
summary: The beginning of a magical adventure at Hogwarts.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
author: John Green
summary: A heartwarming and heartbreaking story of young love and loss.

title: The Hunger Games
author: Suzanne Collins
summary: A thrilling tale of survival and rebellion in a dystopian world.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
summary: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.

title: Rich Dad Poor Dad
author: Robert Kiyosaki
summary: A powerful comparison of two financial mindsets and their outcomes.

title: Think and Grow Rich
author: Napoleon Hill
summary: A timeless classic on mindset and success principles.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
summary: A brutally honest approach to living a good life.

title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
summary: Understanding the human side of money and wealth building.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
summary: An exploration of humanity’s evolution and progress.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
summary: A woman discovers alternate lives she could have lived.

title: The Power of Now

summary: A guide to mindfulness and living in the present moment.
